Summary: On the registration page, when you enter a spacebar instead symbols in the password field, an account is registered
Preconditions: Open website 'Name' Be on the registration page
Description: 1.Input valid data in the email 2.Full Name fieldsInput 12 spacebars in the Password field 3.Input 12 spacebars in the Confirm Password field 4.Click the button Registration.
Actual result: Successful registration with the spacebars in the Password.
